game_description: chill your slugness through the jungle plants while listening to slug's favourite music or drive your mini-me in a desert full of dangers! join our discord to slug about the game https://discord.gg/E56AyFKnN9
review_1: I like the look of this and there's a bit of depth to it. Minigames or something I forget.
review_2: In this game you can explore places with your friends, personally, I love the desert place because the little carts are amazing.
review_3: I enjoyed a lot this game, amazing. I hope the creator make more updates.
